description: This file defines a React hook 'useAppInteractions' that sets up page-level interaction behaviors such as smooth scrolling for anchor links, focus styling on Tab key press, and pressed feedback for buttons and navigation items. It initializes event listeners on mount and cleans them up on unmount.

methods.name: useAppInteractions()
methods.description: Custom React hook that sets up event listeners for interactions like smooth scrolling, focus styles, and pressed feedback for elements with classes '.btn' and '.nav-item'. It manages event setup and cleanup within React's lifecycle.
